My suggestions for improvement would be to have an option to make the weapons list auto-collapse to only see weapon trees you're interested in for ease of access, as well as a search function to find specific weapons. Thank you for such a great app, it's made my time in MonHun so much more fun!

The only problem is that some items are description-less which can be a bit annoying when searching for it, but those are few and far between.

title: Comprehensive but clunky

However, equipment database is troublesome to browse, as the only filters you have are head, body, hands, waist, feet etc. You have to search through the entire library from low to G rank, and I end up just using the item search bar.

title: This hottest App
comment: I love this app it has helped me out in those random challenges, were you start without the map and you have to track down the wyvern or beast. It pretty much shows with small detail the habitat. So if you ran out of psych serum to spot or track them, you can take a good guess. Also it comes in handy when you run out of equipment and you need to combine to move forward and restock. What can I help improve? If the app maker needs graphic help, I am willing to cooperate free of charge to make this awesome.

title: Nearly Perfect

That said, This is the best MH guide app out there IMO. 😃

title: Awesome & Useful App!
comment: Awesome app. It seems very complete and intuitive. I love the UI as well, it seems very polished and comfortable. SOME SUGGESTIONS: A search function... With so many monsters, weapons, and armor to scroll through, this is a must. Also, perhaps (if possible) pictures for the armor and weapons. Love it so far!

title: A solid reference with an outstanding wishlist feature
comment: There are a number of MH apps out there, but the "wishlist" feature on this one makes it my favorite.  The UI for viewing some of the items isn't perfect, but all the info is there, which is more than I can say for some of the other apps.  My only issue with the app is that I can't select and view an entire set of armor; I can only view each piece individually.  It would be nice to be able to view a complete set so I can see all the armor skills added up.  I can imagine this functionality represents a non-trivial amount of work though, so it's understandable that it's missing.

comment: Great app, great data, very good design. Something that's missing, UX-wise, it that you can't search in weapon trees, so you have to scan the list, some of which are pretty long. Some sort of search would be great. Looking forward to the damage calculator feature!

title: The best mobile MH4U DB
comment: Simply excellent!
Good utility, gets good, frequent updates!

title: The best companion for MH4U
comment: Since obtaining it, this tool has been right next to me at every hunt providing me with all matters of useful info. Totally recommended. Would be nice if traded parts from wycoon would appear together with its required quests. I've have to visit kiranico for it.

title: Fantastic resource
comment: Includes maps with resource locations

title: Wish list Erasing
comment: Whenever I close the app, my wish list and materials is removed. Works great until then.

title: All others are knock offs
comment: This is the app by which all other MH4U apps get their data from. It doesn't get better than the original.

title: fantastic
comment: a must-have for hunters!

title: Awesome!
comment: Neat and compact reference for when I'm not near my comp.  Now I can park it on the couch and still look stuff up.  Nice!!

title: Must have Monster Hunter App
comment: Must have monster hunter app! Use it all the time.

title: Best place for quick MH info!
comment: - super organized - easy to understand charts - always updated!  Can't ask for much more!

title: Amazing
comment: Absolutely awesome. Can't hunt without it. Fantastic design and super easy to use.
Fantastic resource

title: A great app for MH4U
comment: What I consider the best of the MH4U apps out there. Needs a little work in the areas as other people have suggested but still the best much like your MH3U app became my default for MH3U

title: I love it
comment: So far, it's the best MH4U companion app on the play store. Beautiful design with a lot of information that's easy to sort through.

title: Totally like this app, with a few suggestions
comment: Like how easy and readily available it is when I need to find some info regarding the game. Wish the following areas could be improved 1. the weapon tree could have proper expand / cascade to show different branches. 2. Some quests are dependent on completion of others to be made visible. Would be good if the prerequisite quest is specified in those quests. 3. Items / monsters etc could be display in alphabetical order, else provide a search bar within each section to help with quickly locate the result.

title: Best App I've Found So Far
comment: I tried out most of the top apps for Monster Hunter and none of them compared to this one. Good design, open source on github, and in active development with the developer looking for feedback. My only suggestion thus far is to make more than just the item list searchable. Searchable monster, armor, and weapon lists would make things much easier. Highly recommended for someone looking for a good Monster Hunting companion.

title: Fantastic MH4U database
comment: Great layout, easy access to everything. A Palico gear section would be nice, otherwise its fantastic!

title: Great
comment: The design is great overall, the only nuisance is the design of the weapon trees which makes finding branched paths hard

title: Best MH4U application
comment: I use 3 others MH4U related app, but after found MH4U Database, i uninstalled it all. This app very simple but has all information that i need. Loved it. 👍
best looking, and most complete MH4U app on the play store.
Awesome, much appreciated!
Great
Very good data base, if able to add more details for quest will be better

title: Nice
comment: Its nice but i cant download it soo im sad T-T

title: The best mh4u reference app!
comment: Everything you'll ever need while playing mh4u at your fingertips.

title: A Few Dislikes
comment: This app is really clean, I use it and Kiranico and Ping's Dex. One dislike is that the Slagtoth's has the wrong icon and the other is the lack of the main menu search

title: Absolutely the best Monster Hunter companion
comment: This app rocks. It is the most in depth and easy to use of all the companion apps.  It's also updated regularly and keeps getting better!

title: Well-done App
comment: Mhmm! Works perfectly!

title: By far the best!
comment: THE app for MH4U.

title: Needs rapid fire info
comment: I love the app, but it lacks info on rapid fire and barrage mode for the Bowlin weapons.

title: Fantastic!
comment: Best one yet! Love the look and ease of use!

title: Really great!
comment: I know it's not complete, but what i love is that it has skill trees that tells you what armors have the skill your looking for! Great for mixing armors! And it also tells you how to get the weapon easily by giving you that weapons upgrading tree too (really convinient :D!)

title: Awesome Companion.
comment: Interface is great, and the way they're improving for the next one looks great. Can't wait for the next release. Only thing in my wishlist is to get images of weapons and armor in it.

title: Couple of suggestions about armor
comment: Love this app, so helpful.  One change I'd like to see is to have the armor grouped in sets, instead of having to look at each individual set.  This would make it easier to see what the set skills are.  Also, something that would be cool is have be able to make custom sets where we mix and match pieces to see what skills will be activated.  Anyway, thanks so much for creating this app.

title: Best current companion
comment: this is currently the most complete Dex i have downloaded ... now i cant give it a 5 star yet because the weapon tab is confusing... can you just make it so that ot would run in a drop down system when we need only to click the base weapon to see its branches

title: Great!
comment: Still waiting on some stuff to be added, but the best android app around right now.

title: Great and very useful
comment: I like the simple design and look very easy great job

title: A.S.S would be great! :)
comment: Great work, and really appreciated! But i was thinking that armor set search based on specified skills would be a great addition, just like Athena's A.S.S for other MH games. Hopefully you'll include it soon. Happy hunting!

title: The perfect hunting buddy
comment: It's like that girl that shows up to the hunt with closed already sent free. She even brings her own rifle, oh yes, its clean. Great data.
Great app

title: AWESOME
comment: So detailed,  this is what i looking for.

title: Very useful
comment: As my title state

title: Amazing app
comment: All data stored offline too, perfect for my buddy who just left on a cruise with no internet. Not to mention the great Android design standards used in this app. Applause all around, great job!

title: great
comment: this is great application, thank ^^

title: Pretty good
comment: This one one is way better than the other Mh4u apps I have. This one is So convenient. Thumbs up. Keep up the good work. Only need minor tweaks.

title: Prefer old Main menu
comment: Best mh4u app! Prefer the old main menu though. Maybe let user choose between the old and new one? Also, can quest show icon too instead of just title. Wishlist cant update quantity..

title: Amazing but needs more
comment: It's a great app but could you add canteen food quests, palico upgrade quests, and the caravan next to every quest just like how you show the key and urgent quests.

title: Best MH4U App!
comment: Found this app while using my phone's browser to search for game info a few weeks back and I got to say... I love it! Not riddled with ads and is super fast to find what you're looking for. Blows the MH Wikia app out of the water. Great job on this app and keep up the good work!

title: Great!
comment: Could use search, sharing, weapon images, and a permanent wishlist

title: Looks great.
comment: Really like the style. Would like to have a section for Wymporium trades.

title: Hnnnng
comment: HHHHNNNNNNNGGGGGGGGG

title: Great database.
comment: This is by far the best MH4U DB on google play. Very complete and simple. Developer did an incredibly good job on this. Not being a jerk, just want to make some suggestions: the menu for sections (quests, monsters, locations etc) could the home page and armors could be separeted by set (easier to check skill points). But definitely worth 5 stars.

title: Note 3
comment: Easily my favorite database for mh4u

title: Fantastic companion app!
comment: Monster Hunter 4 is a very item-rich game, boasting thousands of armor and weapon combinations with unclear methods to obtain them - This app makes looking them up very simple, and is so far the only place I've found that creates a check-list for all the materials you need to craft your dream armor/weapon set via wishlist!   My only complaint is the lack of a centeralized search bar on the home page (it's actually the "item search" feature) and some data tables are a little messy (bowgun ammo types especially) - Minor complaints that I'm sure the developer is aware of; This is still the most useful thing since Kiranico!

title: Great resource
comment: Saves me a lot of time. I used to refer to kiranico, but this is much more convenient!

title: Followed the app from Reddit
comment: Love the app, however a suggestion that will help a lot if the weapon upgrade paths. They are very hard to follow maybe some lines linking to the different paths and when it splits again two more paths open and so on.

title: Great app but...
comment: A very helpful and informative app for new hunters and veterans alike, but just noticed a bug. When you are selecting the wishlist to rename it or deleting a wishlist, the icons for them does not exist. Just a small bug I noticed.
It's monhun
Simple, effective, and thorough.

title: FREAKING AMAZING
comment: THE BEST MOST ALL ENCOMPASSING MH4U APP TO DATE , NO NEED FOR KIRANICO IF YOU'RE OFFLINE

title: Awesome but no landscape
comment: This is my favorite amongst the current MH4U app/guides on Android but it does not have landscape mode. Thus, the four stars.

title: Excellent App
comment: Its a bit rough around the edges as of posting but its being patched regularly, and has no false information.

title: Excellent application
comment: Easy to use, simple, and has everything I need.

title: Not perfect but awesome
comment: Keep working on this app, guys! This is genius! Please add the ability to delete things from wish lists.

comment: Absolutely amazing. This app makes you become an informed hunter.

title: Love it
comment: Easy to use. Especially on the fly swapping or item farming

title: MH4U Must have app!!!
comment: This app is so useful and amazing and keeps me from having to Google everything like a total scrub!!! Best part is they are reddit guys (or girl) who have even bigger and better updates coming!!!

title: Great execution
comment: That's be best MH database I've ever seen. The interface is great and it's really wel organized.

title: The best of the best
comment: Of the best of the best! It's been a pleasure working on this with you guys! Can't wait to release new features in the future.

title: Excellent resource
comment: If you're new to Monster Hunter or even a vet, this app is a great thing to have on hand on your phone or tablet while you're playing. It contains carve drops from monsters, so you know what part of the body to focus on for specific materials, as well as location drops for rare ores and herbs so you don't waste your time looking in the wrong place.  Overall just a great info source without having to resort to navigating a mobile wiki page. Plus it's material design!

title: Best on Market
comment: This is the best MH4U app on the market and is actively being improved. Thanks devs for such a useful app.

title: So Tasty!
comment: So the app is excellent.  One minor complaint is no search function as far as I can tell. Right now if I go into a category I have to scroll through a rather long list to find the info I want, a search feature would be incredible.  Other then that the app seems great right now.

title: Like it a lot
comment: This app really helps me way more than looking up the wikia for the game.
Just what the Hunter ordered :)

title: Super useful
comment: Thanks Dev, love it!

title: Few dislikes
comment: I'd prefer organizing the monster dmging and weaknesses from highest to lowest since that's what you wanna look at, add a filter above monster and decorations so people can search easier. Also make status bar colored. Besides that good work!

title: Everything you could need!
comment: This is way more detailed  than any of the other apps i have seen.

title: Excellent App to have.
comment: All the information you need just at your fingertips

title: Great companion
comment: This app is lightweight, fast, and works as described. Makes hunting much more efficient. My only suggestion is to provide an FAQ for how to read some of the pages as it can be slightly confusing to read for new hunters. Great work, thank you!
